triples.name: Recommender system
triples.relevance: Recommender systems are the foundational technology that the paper surveys, specifically in conversational contexts.

triples.name: Information overload
triples.relevance: The paper addresses the problem of information overload that recommender systems help users navigate.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: Significant progress in NLP is identified as a key driver enabling the development of conversational recommender systems.

triples.name: Chatbot
triples.relevance: The increased use of chatbot technology is cited as a major factor driving interest in conversational recommender systems.

triples.name: Smart speaker
triples.relevance: Voice-controlled home assistants (smart speakers) are mentioned as an emerging technology driving CRS development.

triples.name: Preference elicitation
triples.relevance: The paper discusses how conversational interactions help improve the preference elicitation process in recommender systems.
